divs: sighting detailsi see those blue things every night too. isn't the north star supposed to be the brightest star in the sky? why is this thing hovering in the southern hemisphere 5 times the brightness level of the north star? maybe they are satellites. i have seen the white balls move except ghosts or orbs platform on the ground, in a house, a certain area, not 10,000 feet plus in the skies. maybe i have thought they are orbs of angels watching over, maybe family but then i have seen the lights move jittery like two magnets balancing themselves and unmarked planes constantly circling them 24\7. that rules out satellites , angel orbs and\0r government research, for they are more precise and have real estate not even in the united states, much less the western edge of the chicago suburbs.. there is something chilling near saint charles, illinois...if you got money to blow and are some dork check it out. any questions .... reharkthte@yahoo.com
